name: Akveloncustomerhelper
0:
”Alexa, open event organizer”
”Alexa, ask event organizer save my name Mark”
”Alexa, ask event organizer set meeting today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: event organizer
des:
This skill allows to set a meeting with Akvelon company. Akvelon is a business and technology solutions firm that specializes in applying cutting-edge technology to problems in fields as diverse as mobile technology, finance, and healthcare.
To set a meeting you can just say "open event organizer" and Alexa help you with saving your name and setting meeting.
To set a meeting you can just say "open event organizer" and Alexa help you with saving your name and setting meeting.
If you want to resave you company name, just say "ask event organizer save my name". You can use different phrases like, "remember my name", "remember me" to save it, and after a phrase you can add a company name to save it immediately, without a dialog mode. "alexa, ask event organizer save my name Mark" 
You can also set a meeting by saying "ask event organizer set meeting". Here you can also say a phrase without a dialog mode "ask event organizer, set meeting *date you want* at *time you want*"
